channel.title: Jarring client problem
channel.description:
so i want to jar stabbingscape (317 allstar) but if i choose as main-class client i don't see textures and if i choose as main-class gui(in normal client it just starts up the good way but if i delete the theme.jar i get this error too) then i get this error when i start up with bat: [code]connecting to update server java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAnd Feel at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.SwingUtilities.loadSystemClass(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(Unknown Source) at Gui.initUI(Gui.java:73) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:53) at Gui.main(Gui.java:40)[/code]
do does anybody know how i can jar my client with as main-class gui and with theme.jar in the jar so it can load into the client?

item.title: Jarring client problem
item.dc:creator: @ruud123 ruud123
item.description:
@ruud123 wrote:

so i want to jar stabbingscape (317 allstar)
but if i choose as main-class client i donâ€™t see textures
and if i choose as main-class gui(in normal client it just starts up the good way but if i delete the theme.jar i get this error too) then i get this error when i start up with bat:

connecting to update server java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAnd Feel at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.SwingUtilities.loadSystemClass(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(Unknown Source) at Gui.initUI(Gui.java:73) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:53) at Gui.main(Gui.java:40)

do does anybody know how i can jar my client with as main-class gui and with theme.jar in the jar so it can load into the client?
